question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
What is the patient's age?
What is the patient's sex or gender?
Who is requesting this consult?
If other, please list who and the relationship to the patient
Is the patient consulting with an attorney about his / her headaches?
If yes, please complete the table below:
Is the patient on disability or applying for disability due to his / her headaches?
If yes, please explain
Is the patient:
Age of Onset of Headaches?
How old were you when you had your first headache?
Does the patient have a history of any of the following? (Please check all that apply)
Can the patient read in the back seat of a car while in motion?
What is the most common time of the day for the headaches to begin? (Please check all that apply)

selection.text: During the middle of the night

question.prompt: If Other/Comments, Please explain
How long from when the patient first experiences the very first pain until the headache is at its worst?
If Other/Comments, Please explain
Please describe the location of the initial headache pain
Please describe the quality of the patient's headache pain: (Please check all that apply)
If Other/Comments, Please explain
What triggers/brings on the patient's headache? (Please check all that apply)

selection.text: Stress release / let down from stress / vacation / weekends

question.prompt: If foods, which ones?
If Other triggers/Comments, Please explain
Please describe the symptoms that you may experience with your headache. (fill in all that apply)

table_data.cell: Vertigo (feeling of motion when one is stationary)

question.prompt: Please describe the symptoms that you may experience. (fill in all that apply)

table_data.cell: Weakness (Where on the body and when it occurs during the headache)
Numbness (Where on the body and when it occurs during the headache)
Tearing Eye (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Runny Nose (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Foreign body, sand, grit, or eyelash sensation in eye (one side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Eye lid swelling (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Droopy Eye (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Small Pupil (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Large Pupil (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Red Eye (One side or both, please be specific as to which side)
Neck Pain (Please describe when during the headache it occurs)

question.prompt: At the peak of the patient's headache, is it worse with movement, such as bending over, climbing stairs, jumping up and down?
If yes, please explain
Is the patient's headache better when lying down or in any specific position?
If yes, please explain
On a scale of 1 to 10 with 10 being the most painful, please rate the severity of the patient's headaches (1 = minimal pain, 10 = worst pain)
How often does the patient experience headache attacks? (fill in all that apply)
What is the length of time of the patient's headache attacks? (fill in all that apply)

table_data.cell: After sleep the headaches come back

question.prompt: Is the length of the patient's attack effected by the fact that the patient took medication?

If the patient treats his / her headache with medication as needed

column_definition.label: Number of pills taken per day
Number of pills taken per week on average

column_definition.label: Number of headache days per month

question.prompt: Does the patient experience an aura (experiences before attack occurs)?
If yes, which of the following does the patient experience? (Check all that apply)
If so, please explain where?
If so, please explain where?
If Comments, Please explain
How long does the aura last?
When does the headache start in relation to the aura?
Please describe the type of headache the patient gets after the aura:
Does the patient ever experience and aura without a headache?
If you take into account all of the patient's headaches, from the most mild to the severe, does the patient get headaches more often than not?
Please explain
Please explain

Please explain
Please explain
Does the patient experience headaches every day?
If Yes, Please explain
Do the headaches last less than or greater than 4 hours?

Does the patient experience headaches at the same time each day?
If Yes, Please explain
If the patient gets headaches more often, how long has this been occurring?
When the patient developed headaches more often than not, at least 15 days per month, was it a sudden or gradual development
Does the patient remember the day or week that he / she developed daily headaches?
If Yes, Please describe
Does the patient remember having a cold or infection before developing the daily headaches?
If Yes, Please describe
Did the patient have any injury or trauma before developing the daily headaches?
If yes, please complete the following table with the date and description of the injury
Is the patient agitated or pace with his / her headaches?
If Yes, Please explain
Does the patient want to lie down in a quiet room then he / she develops a headache?
If Yes, Please explain
